Value: Future Metals NL engages in the exploration and development of mineral properties. It explores for precious metals, such as platinum, palladium, iridium, osmium, rhodium, and ruthenium. The company owns a 100% interest in the Panton Platinum Group Metals Project (Panton PGM) consisting of three granted mining leases covering a total area of approximately 23 square kilometers located in the East Kimberley Region of Western Australia. Future Metals NL is based in West Perth, Australia.
